snippet.title: Pangolin Cassowary Pre-release Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Pangolin Cassowary is a short uniquely physics based 3D platformer. Forego jumping for aiming and kicking one of the two playable characters. Soar, roll, and bounce your way through the city's 5 unique areas.

Play simultaneously as the mammalian Pangolin to run, roll, bounce, and dash - and the mighty avian Cassowary to glide, kick, and swim.

Rolling out Feb 1 2024
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2763420/Pangolin_Cassowary/

Game and trailer by me
Music by Kanoa / Shake Onigiri
